name.baseName: SX and calcination of Rare Earth Oxides (REO);Rare Earth Oxides (REO);bastnaesite route;Rare Earth Elements (REE) containing ore
稀土氧化物;稀土氧化物;氟碳铈矿路线;含稀土元素矿石的SX和煅烧

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The processing route involving solvent extraction (SX) and calcination of rare earth oxides (REO), particularly from bastnaesite containing REE ore, is a critical unit procedure applied primarily in the separation and purification of rare earth elements. This industrial process is essential for producing REO, which are pivotal in various high-tech applications, such as in the manufacturing of permanent magnets, catalysts, glass additives, and specialized ceramics. The Bayan Obo region in the Chinese Southern Provinces is significant for its REO production capabilities.
涉及溶剂萃取（SX）和稀土氧化物（REO）煅烧的加工路线，特别是从含稀土元素的氟碳铈矿石，是分离和纯化稀土元素中的一个关键单元过程。这一工业过程对生产REO至关重要，REO在多种高科技应用中占有重要地位，例如在永磁材料、催化剂、玻璃添加剂和专用陶瓷的制造中。中国南方省份的白云鄂博地区在REO生产能力方面非常重要。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The study considered 15 different functional units corresponding to different RE metals. The assessment included three main RE production sites in China: REO production in Bayan Obo, Sichuan, and IACs. Primary data were collected for foreground production processes from Chinese and further international scientific literature, industry reports, government and industry surveys. The authors assumed a baseline for aqueous and gaseous emissions using national discharge standards for industry from the Chinese Ministry of

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 白云鄂博, 中国南方省份

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Because no primary mining data from Bayan Obo were available, LCI data in the studies (Sprecher, Arshi, Marx, Bailey (Classen et al., 2007)) are based on different data sources either from iron mining or in Althaus from phosphate rock mining. Main inputs are energy and blasting agent
由于没有白云鄂博的初级采矿数据，研究中的生命周期清单数据（Sprecher、Arshi、Marx、Bailey（Classen 等人，2007 年））基于不同的数据源，要么来自铁矿开采，要么来自 Althaus 的磷矿开采。主要投入是能源和爆破剂
technology.technologicalApplicability: The processing route involving solvent extraction (SX) and calcination of rare earth oxides (REO), particularly from bastnaesite containing REE ore, is a critical unit procedure applied primarily in the separation and purification of rare earth elements. This industrial process is essential for producing REO, which are pivotal in various high-tech applications, such as in the manufacturing of permanent magnets, catalysts, glass additives, and specialized ceramics. The Bayan Obo region in the Chinese Southern Provinces is significant for its REO production capabilities.
涉及溶剂萃取（SX）和稀土氧化物（REO）煅烧的加工路线，特别是从含稀土元素的氟碳铈矿石，是分离和纯化稀土元素中的一个关键单元过程。这一工业过程对生产REO至关重要，REO在多种高科技应用中占有重要地位，例如在永磁材料、催化剂、玻璃添加剂和专用陶瓷的制造中。中国南方省份的白云鄂博地区在REO生产能力方面非常重要。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Goal of this chapter is to identify the most important differences and uncertainties of crucial parameters in the LCIs and to link those directly to the affected LCIAs. However, comparability of LCIA results shown in Fig. 4 is limited due to different LCIA methods, as already mentioned in the chapter “methods”. All LCIA results are shown in Tables S1 and S3 (Supplementary material). It should also be mentioned that we calculated Althaus' LCIA data, as he provided only the LCI in the ecoinvent database. For this, we rebuilt Althaus' original process “rare earth oxide production from bastnasite” in the GaBi software and evaluated it with two LCIA methods for comparison (Table S1).

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Schreiber, A., Marx, J. & Zapp, P. Life Cycle Assessment studies of rare earths production - Findings from a systematic review. Science of The Total Environment 791, 148257 (2021).
Schreiber, A., Marx, J. & Zapp, P. Life Cycle Assessment studies of rare earths production - Findings from a systematic review. Science of The Total Environment 791, 148257 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) data, users must account for the lack of primary mining data from Bayan Obo by referencing alternative datasets derived from either iron or phosphate rock mining. Users are advised to be cautious of the uncertainties and differences in crucial parameters across the Life Cycle Inventories (LCIs) and should note the limitations in the comparability of Life Cycle Impact Assessment (LCIA) results due to varying methodology. Additionally, users may need to recalculate LCIA data when utilizing other LCIA methods not covered in this study. It is essential to consult supplementary material such as Tables S1 and S3 for detailed results and consider the technological applicability of the data carefully while integrating it into broader environmental assessments.

在使用这些生命周期评估（LCA）数据时，用户必须通过参考从铁矿石或磷矿石开采得到的替代数据集来解释白云鄂博缺乏原始采矿数据的问题。用户需谨慎关注跨生命周期清单（LCI）中关键参数的不确定性和差异，并注意由于方法学的不同，生命周期影响评价（LCIA）结果的可比性受到限制。此外，当使用本研究未涉及的其他LCIA方法时，用户可能需要重新计算LCIA数据。在将数据纳入更广泛环境评估时，查阅补充材料如S1和S3表中的详细结果，并仔细考虑数据的技术适用性至关重要。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil
